verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w river|strong="G4215"\w* of \w water|strong="G5204"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w clear|strong="G2986"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w crystal|strong="G2930"\w*, \w proceeding|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w street|strong="G4113"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* on either \w side|strong="G1782"\w* of the \w river|strong="G4215"\w*, \add was there\add* the \w tree|strong="G3586"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, which \w bare|strong="G4160"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \add manner of\add* \w fruits|strong="G2590"\w*, \add and\add* \w yielded|strong="G0591"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w month|strong="G3376"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w leaves|strong="G5444"\w* of the \w tree|strong="G3586"\w* \add were\add* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w healing|strong="G2322"\w* of the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w curse|strong="G2652"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* shall \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add shall be\add* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w candle|strong="G3088"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* of the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w giveth|strong="G5461"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w light|strong="G5461"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w* \add are\add* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* to \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w* be \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\wj  \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w quickly|strong="G5035"\+w*: \+w blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w he|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that keepeth|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w the sayings|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w of the prophecy|strong="G4394"\+w* \+w of this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w book|strong="G0975"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add them\add*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* I had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*, I fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* of the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* which \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w See|strong="G3708"\w* \add thou do it\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w fellowservant|strong="G4889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*: \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Seal|strong="G4972"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* at \w hand|strong="G1451"\w*.

He that is \w unjust|strong="G0091"\w*, let him be \w unjust|strong="G0091"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he which is \w filthy|strong="G4510"\w*, let him be \w filthy|strong="G4510"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that is \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, let him be \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that is \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, let him be \w holy|strong="G0037"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w*.

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w quickly|strong="G5035"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w reward|strong="G3408"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*, \+w to give|strong="G0591"\+w* \+w every man|strong="G1538"\+w* \+w according as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Alpha|strong="G0001"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Omega|strong="G5598"\+w*, \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the end|strong="G5056"\+w*, \+w the first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the last|strong="G2078"\+w*.\wj*

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add are\add* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* may \w have|strong="G2071"\w* \w right|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w tree|strong="G3586"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* may enter \w in|strong="G1525"\w* through the \w gates|strong="G4440"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \add are\add* \w dogs|strong="G2965"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sorcerers|strong="G5333"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whoremongers|strong="G4205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w murderers|strong="G5406"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w idolaters|strong="G1496"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w loveth|strong="G5368"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* a \w lie|strong="G5579"\w*.

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w Jesus|strong="G2424"\+w* \+w have sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w angel|strong="G0032"\+w* \+w to testify|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the churches|strong="G1577"\+w*. \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the root|strong="G4491"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the offspring|strong="G1085"\+w* \+w of David|strong="G1138"\+w*, \+add and\+add* \+w the bright|strong="G2986"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w morning|strong="G3720"\+w* \+w star|strong="G0792"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w bride|strong="G3565"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* let him that \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* let him that is \w athirst|strong="G1372"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* whosoever \w will|strong="G2309"\w*, let him \w take|strong="G2983"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w testify|strong="G4828"\w* unto every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* shall \w add|strong="G2007"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w add|strong="G2007"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w* that are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* shall take \w away|strong="G0851"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall take \w away|strong="G0851"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w*.

He \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w testifieth|strong="G3140"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Surely|strong="G3483"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w quickly|strong="G5035"\+w*.\wj* \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. Even \w so|strong="G3483"\w*, \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
